Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Directs MTA to establish free bus fares for students
Summary: Directs the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to establish a free bus fare program for students.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to free bus fare for students on the Metropolitan Transportation Authority omnibus service
